Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its high-quality features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $120. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between the product's worth and your perceived valuation. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
